Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] Saascoin, a blockchain-based payment gateway tailored to SaaS
Body: Thanks for your input, we are actually would be happy to redistribute extra mined coins back to the community its not really about the pre-mine for us it's more about a working product that utilizes the coin in the right manners.  We will update the roadmap accordingly and you may know this project was not actually funded by any party but the core working team members.  The main post of the thread will be updated to reflect the new changes in the road map and the platform we are building  Quote from: zerolty on June 21, 2018, 05:59:30 PM Is the project totally dead?  Not really, we are still alive but taking more time than expected. Time estimation is really a problem, bitcoin took almost 10 years to reach where it is right now, we will take less than that (I believe so!).  You can also check our mainnet explorer here http://blocks.saascoin.us  Thanks,  Saascoin team

Author: waheedii
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO] Saascoin, a blockchain-based payment gateway tailored to SaaS
Body: Abstract  Saascoin believes in creating an open gateway platform that eliminates most of the prevalent challenges associated with payments, giving the freedom for people to execute their transactions seamlessly. In a world where banks and payment gateways have the upper hand on their clients’ payments, achieving a fee free immediate transaction environment via seamless platform integration is key.  Saascoin further recognizes that buyers and sellers of virtual goods and services need a complimentary virtual currency that returns complete control of transactions to those transacting.  Traditional Payment Gateway Challenges   Efficient revenue collection is a vital process for any business, especially in the SaaS industry, where most businesses adopt a premium subscription model.  In these use cases, collection should be as simple as possible for both the consumer and the business.  Unfortunately, this is not the current reality.  Problems arise due to differing reasons. These include customer payment model prefer-ences as well as payment methods themselves.  An example is the Eurobond, where most transactions happen via direct debit cards, and not credit cards as is prevalent in the Unit-ed States.  Catering to these customer preferences can limit the expansion of a SaaS business.  If a business was focused on expansion into Europe, but unable to cater to direct debit on a recurring basis, customers would either shy away from subscribing or alternatively churn relatively quickly.  SaaS, in a globalizing world, is in need of a simple and dynamic payment framework that enables monthly recurring revenue collection irrespective of geographic challenges.   Solution  Saascoin is designed as a next-generation blockchain-based payment gateway.  It is genuinely tailored for the needs of SaaS businesses, powering these companies with a platform that solves most, if not all, of their current payment gateway obstacles.  Saascoin aims to disrupt the current payment processing industry by providing a trustworthy, transparent, safe, and reliable payment gateway platform, while also eliminating the pain points of payment gateway fees, chargebacks, and associated administrative headaches existing in the current relationship model with gateways.   Stats  Algorithm: CryptoNight/CryptoNote a fork of Monero Block reward: 15 SAAS Block time: 3 minutes Fee per kb: 0.000300000000 ICO start date: February 22th, 2018 PRE-ICO price : $0.5 PRE-ICO payment methods: BTC, ETH, LTC, XMR and Fiat currency ICO supply: 10,500,000 SAAS Max Coin Supply: 77,000,000 SAAS Saascoin Explorer: http://blocks.saascoin.us Bounties for the community: 70,000 SAAS White Paper: https://getsaascoin.com/pdf/whitepaper.pdf Road map: https://getsaascoin.com/pdf/roadmap.pdf Pre ICO Website: https://getsaascoin.com Multi-Sig: Enabled Spend proof: Enabled Balance proof: Enabled   Mining Pools and Saascoin wallets (Linux, Windows, Mac, Android, iOS) will be available for public after ICO completion.  Contact us through https://getsaascoin.com  We are happy to answer any technical or business questions.  Thanks,  Saascoin Team     Update as per requested  Real people behind it  Waheed Barghouthi https://www.linkedin.com/in/waheedi/ Mohammad Abdelkarim  https://www.linkedin.com/in/mohammad-abdulkarim-35ba23140/ Ammar Hammoudeh https://www.linkedin.com/in/ammar-hammoudeh-85258451/ Ibrahim Albarghouthi https://www.linkedin.com/in/ibrahimalbarghouthii    https://image.ibb.co/mAP04x/saascoin_Road_Map.png

Please let me know if you think these numbers are high, and I would love to know the reasoning behind your opinion.  Thanks,
